info.title: ConnectedCache
info.description: Private RP Microsoft Connected cache REST API version 2023-05-01-preview

get.description: Retrieves a list of available API operations
get.summary: Retrieves a list of available API operations under this Resource Provider

200.description: The request was successful; response contains the list of operations under private.connectedcache resource provider

default.description: Error response describing the reason for operation failure. 404 - NotFound (Connected Cache does not exist.)

get.description: Gets the ispCustomer resource information using this get call

200.description: The get request was successful; response contains the ispCustomer

default.description: The get request has failed; error response details : 4xx/5xx for ispCustomer

default.description: The delete request has failed; error response details : 4xx/5xx for ispCustomer

CustomerEntity.description: Model representing Cache Node for ConnectedCache resource

FullyQualifiedResourceId.description: fully qualified resource id of the customer in azure resource manager

PrimaryAccountKey.description: primary account key. This is internal to mcc

SecondaryAccountKey.description: secondary account key. This is internal to mcc

IsEntitled.description: flag to indicate if the customer is entitled

Location.description: azure region where the customer is created

CreateCorrelationId.description: correlation id of the create customer operation

UpdateCorrelationId.description: correlation id of the update customer operation

ShouldDelete.description: indicates if the customer is marked for deletion

DeleteRectifierCorrelationId.description: correlation id of the delete operation

DeleteAsyncOperationId.description: async operation id of the delete operation

ClientTenantId.description: client tenantId of the customer subscription

AttemptedDeletes.description: number of delete attempts of the customer

DeletedFlagSetDateTime.description: timestamp when delete flag was set for the customer

SynchWithArmAttemptsCount.description: number of sync attempts with arm

LastSyncWithArmTimestamp.description: timestamp of last sync with arm

IsEnterpriseManaged.description: flag indicating if customer enterprise managed

CacheNodeEntity.description: Model representing Cache Node for ConnectedCache resource

FullyQualifiedResourceId.description: fully qualified resource id of the customer in azure resource manager

IpAddress.description: IP address of the cache node

IsEnabled.description: flag indicating if the cache node is enabled

MaxAllowableProbability.description: maximum alloweable probability of the cache node

IsEnterpriseManaged.description: is the cache node managed by enterprise

DeleteAsyncOperationId.description: async operation id of the delete operation

ClientTenantId.description: client tenantId of the customer subscription

DeletedFlagSetDateTime.description: timestamp when delete flag was set for the customer

ReleaseVersion.description: release version of the cache node

LastSyncWithArmTimestamp.description: timestamp of last sync with arm

SynchWithArmAttemptsCount.description: number of attempts to synchronize the customer with ARM

ContainerConfigurations.description: configuration details of cache node container

CidrCsvLastUpdateTime.description: timestamp of last update to cidr csv

BgpCidrCsv.description: comma separated value of bgp cidrs

BgpCidrCsvLastUpdateTime.description: timestamp of last update to bgp cidr csv

BgpLastReportedTime.description: timestamp of last bgp report time

BgpNumberOfTimesUpdated.description: number of times bgp has been updated

BgpAddressSpace.description: total addressable space as defined by the BGP CIDR blocks

BgpFileBytesTruncated.description: number of bytes truncated from source BGP output file on the CacheNode

CidrSelectionType.description: current selection type for CIDR range precedence

IsFrozen.description: indicates that a specific cache node has been frozen (not selectable, not editable in UI)

ControllingCacheNodeId.description: indicates the cache node id of the controlling cache node

ReviewState.description: current state of the review process

ReviewStateText.description: current text associated with the review state

ReviewFeedback.description: current review feedback for the user

AddressSpace.description: total addressable space as defined by the CIDR blocks

IsVerified.description: total addressable space as defined by the CIDR blocks

Location.description: ARM resource location for the cache node

ResourceType.description: ARM resource type for the cache node

IsDeleted.description: indicates that we have successfully received deleted

CreateCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for create

UpdateCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for update

DeleteRectifierCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for delete

IoTRectifierCorrelationId.description: correlation Id that should be used for iot rectification

WorkerConnections.description: number of worker connections that is needed for the deployment manifest for MCC Container

WorkerConnections_LastUpdatedDateTime.description: indicates the most recent date time when the worker count on the physical MCC was successfully updated

ContainerResyncTrigger.description: increment to trigger immediate re-sync of CacheNode to container configurations
